archimate:SystemSoftware.name: Distributed Cache
archimate:SystemSoftware.documentation:
Distributed Cache
• Purpose: High-performance caching layer to reduce database load and improve response times • Types: In-memory cache, distributed cache, application cache, database cache • Data: Frequently accessed patient data, lookup tables, session data, computed results • Technology: Redis, Memcached, Hazelcast, application-level caching • Patterns: Cache-aside, write-through, write-behind, refresh-ahead • Benefits: Reduced latency, improved scalability, decreased database load, better user experience
